BiblioData.Title: HEAT PIPE WITH NANOTSTRUCTURED WICKING MATERIAL
BiblioData.Abstract: A heat pipe with a nanostructured wick is disclosed, with the method of forming the nanostructured wick on a metal substrate. The wicking material is a pattern of metallic nanostructures in the form of bristles or nanowires attached to a substrate, where the bristles are substantially freestanding.
